name: Serenata
description:
In this game you serenade several girls trying to win their affection. But beware her dad and brother watch over her and won't let you get close.

It is based on retro style arcade's system trying to emulate almost any aspect of those old games.

CONTROLS

A and S keys to move left and right 

B to play music,

M to jump 

START A GAME: Press on CREDITS on the right down corner (not on number) this will add credits (as coins) then push on the START label.

The game can be easily played without instructions with simple mechanics that gets a a little bit harder as the grame progresses.

This version is safe for work.Made with Gdvelop, graphics made entirely from scratch using Graphics Gale.
